translate.english: a lot of / many / quite a few

examples.example: 生活中我们会遇到不少困难，但只要保持乐观积极的态度就能克服它们。

translate.english: In life we will encounter many difficulties, but as long as we keep an optimistic and positive attitude, we can overcome them.

examples.example: 图书馆里有不少有趣的书籍，吸引着众多读者前来阅读。

translate.english: There are quite a number of interesting books in the library, attracting a large number of readers to come and read.

examples.example: 这次活动吸引了不少人前来参加，现场气氛十分热烈。

translate.english: This activity attracted quite a number of people to come and participate, and the atmosphere at the scene was very lively.
